energy.usef.core.endpoint

Class EncryptionKeyEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.endpoint.EncryptionKeyEndpoint

  • @Path(value="/EncryptionKey")
public class EncryptionKeyEndpoint
extends Object
    TEMPORARY service class allowing to create a new NaCl secret key and returning the associated public key.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewEncryptionKeyPair

        @POST
 @Path(value="/create")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createNewEncryptionKeyPair(String seed)
        REST endpoint to create a new Encryption key pair in the system. Private key will be stored in a keystore and the public key is returned in the HTTP response as a Base64-encoded String.
        Parameters:
        seed - - String password to generate the key pair.
        Returns:
        a Base64 encoded String
